# Framework

```{r}
library(shiny)
library(ggplot2)

# Shiny template from https://github.com/santiagosnchez/genetic_drift
fluidPage(titlePanel("Genetic Drift Simulator"), 
          sidebarLayout(sidebarPanel(numericInput(inputId = "population_size", 
                                                  label = "Population Size", 
                                                  value = 0, 
                                                  step = 20), 
                                     sliderInput(inputId = "initial_frequency", 
                                                  label = "Initial Allele Frequency", 
                                                  min = 0, 
                                                  max = 1, 
                                                  step = 0.05, 
                                                  value = ), 
                                     actionButton(inputId = "run", 
                                                   label = "Run"), 
                                     actionButton(inputId = "reset",
                                                   label = "Reset")), 
                        mainPanel(fluidRow(column(4, verbatimTextOutput("text"))),
                                  fluidRow(column(8, plotOutput("pop_plot"))), 
                                  fluidRow(column(8, plotOutput("freq_plot"))))))

```
